hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: Find filename :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: set cnt=0 for %%f in (*.exe) do (set /a cnt+=1 & set filename=%%f)
if not %cnt% == 1 ( echo Incorrect number of files found! exit /b 1 )
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: Install package (silently) :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: echo Installing %filename% start "Installing" /wait %filename% /S
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: Run check :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: Batch way of checking for substring is to replace required :: text by empty string and see if it matches the original if not "x%NODE_LABELS:sophos=%" == "x%NODE_LABELS%" ( "%SOPHOS_CLI%" -archive -f -extensive C:\MantidInstall ) set CHECK_STATUS=%ERRORLEVEL%
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: Uninstall package (silently) :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: call "C:\MantidInstall\Uninstall.exe" /S
if %ERRORLEVEL% GTR 0 ( echo Problem detected with uninstall!! Deleting directory by hand rmdir /S /Q C:\MantidInstall exit /b 1 )
exit /b %CHECK_STATUS%
